subject: Exception in JNI?
msgSnippet: Hi all, I am using the JUnit plugin for ant to run through all my tests, but one of the tests accesses some native code over the JNI. If there is an exception
messageBody:
Hi all,

I am using the JUnit plugin for ant to run through all my tests, but
one of the tests accesses some native code over the JNI. If there is
an exception in the native code, it will through an exception and
exit the jvm. Since the JUnit plugin starts up a new JVM for each
test, it will continue with all the other tests, but I wont see that
that test failed in the results digest. Is there any way around this,
so I can see the Error in the final digest?

thanks,

J
